title: McDonnell Takes The Stand, Founding Defense On Marital Dysfunction
teaser: In the corruption trial of Virginia Gov. Bob McDonnell and his wife, McDonnell took the stand as a witness. Jeff E. Schapiro, politics columnist for the Richmond Times-Dispatch, discusses the testimony with Robert Siegel.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
